        Returns:
        returns the prepared statement update count.
        Throws:

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        returns the prepared statement update count.
        Throws:

      • retrieveCustomer

        public static Customer retrieveCustomer​(int ID)
        Retrieve customer query. Used to pull 0ne customer from the DB using the ID. Used to update a customer by pulling the ID from the selected customer. The update customer will populate the field with the data from the DB. Saving will update the DB and the ObservableArrayList in this program. This allows for the update and creation date to be saved.
        Parameters:
        ID - Customer ID to retrieve correct customer.
        Returns:
        Returns the requested customer object from the database.

      • deleteStatement

        public static int deleteStatement​(java.lang.String table,
                                  java.lang.String column,
                                  int condition)
                           throws java.sql.SQLException
        Delete SQL statement. Deletes an entry from the database.
        Parameters:
        table - Table name for the database entry to delete.
        column - column name for the column condition to delete a entry.
        condition - The primary key for the table to delete the entry.
        Returns:
        returns the update count.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Thrown if the sql statement is unsuccessful.

      • initialCustomerConnection

        public static void initialCustomerConnection()
        Select all customers from the Database. Uses a select all from the customers table. Uses the retrieved entries to create customer objects and add them to the observablearraylist. Throws a SQL error if connection is unsuccessful.

      • appointmentsConnection

        public static void appointmentsConnection()
        Selects all appointments from the Database. Uses a select all from the appointments table. Uses the retrieved entries to create appointment objects and add them to the observablearraylist. Throws a SQL error if connection is unsuccessful.

      • retrieveAppointment

        public static Appointment retrieveAppointment​(int ID)
        Retrieve a specific appointment. Uses a select all statement to retrieve all data for a specific appointment. Creates a appointment object from the result set.
        Parameters:
        ID - int ID to select a specific appointment.
        Returns:
        returns appointment object.

      • contactInitialization

        public static void contactInitialization()
        Select all contacts from the Database. Uses a select all from the contacts table. Uses the retrieved entries to create contact objects and add them to the observablearraylist. Throws a SQL error if connection is unsuccessful.

      • monthTotalQuery

        public static void monthTotalQuery()
        Month Total SQL Query. Uses a select all statement to pull from the month_totals table. Uses result set to create MonthTotals objects.

      • contactReport
